thread.section_title: fios.verizon.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of fios.verizon.com | fios.verizon.com
thread.title: Hailey Garcia

author: Hailey Garcia
title: Hailey Garcia
text: William was so helpful when I called Verizon to set up my internet for my new house. With all the hectic things going on with purchasing a new home I completely forgot to set my internet up! He explained everything to me in great detail and informed me if a spot opened up I was more than welcomed to change my installation date! Although there were no openings I still appreciated the fact he gave me an alternative option using the online calendar to see when a tech would be available to help me. William was so patient and helpful. I definitely do not regret choosing fios for my internet. Thank you William and Verizon for training such lovely people.
